remarks: Restricted existential specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
spcimdv.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
spcimedv.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ch -> ps ) ) $.
spcimedv $p |- ( ph -> ( ch -> E. x ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
